channel.title: Linux on Blog about mostly FreeBSD
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Blog about mostly FreeBSD

item.title: FreeBSD Blog
item.description: I’m starting this blog to document my adventures in using the FreeBSD operating system as my daily driver since March of 2021. Although I had used FreeBSD sparingly in the past and mostly for server purposes, this is the first time I’m switching over completely to FreeBSD as a workstation. I hope to document all the pros and cons of such a setup as impartially as I can. Personal History I first started using Computers back in early 1990s.
